text:
[Verse]
Morning sun wakes me up
Coffee brewing in my cup
New day calling rise and shine
All the world feels so divine

[Verse 2]
Hear the birds singing loud
In the streets a bustling crowd
Sipping slowly feeling free
Life is sweet as it can be

[Chorus]
Coffee in the morning glow
Watch the day begin to flow
In this hour all I need
Simple moments plant the seed

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on the city ground
Everywhere there's joy around
Smiles greet me passing by
Underneath the open sky

[Chorus]
Coffee in the morning glow
Watch the day begin to flow
In this hour all I need
Simple moments plant the seed

[Bridge]
In the rush we find our way
Grounded in the light of day
Coffee warmth in hand we see
How the little things can be
title: Morning Coffee
